Title: The Great Red Dragon
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Nick Antosca, Steve Lightfoot, Bryan Fuller
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Hugh Dancy, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: Hannibal has been imprisoned for three years at the Baltimore State Hospital when a new villain emerges in one Francis Dolarhyde. Jack reaches out to Will to help him track down the brutal serial killer.
